MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA3 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in Love Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete the repairs to our equipment on Wallace Street, we needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:24am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:36am on the 29th of January 2021
